name: YURIA
description: The story begins with the kingdom of Yuria being attacked by evil creatures , all the kingdom are killed or taken prisoner with only Tahull , one of best warriors of the royal guard and Johanne princess who had been arrested on debris, these two come together on a journey in search of ancient magic crystals that will bring enough power to stop the evil creatures and the magician of darkness into finally free those who had been taken as prisoners.
